attributes.action: remove the right of laywers to advertise to quell the "where there's blame there's a claim" mentality in our society today.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We feel to allow lawyers and solicitors advertising rights. 

Brings about mistrust and greed. Hence the  goodwill and understanding of each other cannot flourish.

Which is sadly lacking in our society today. 

People must take a responsibility for their own lives and not necessarily expect it must be someone elses fault when things go wrong.
